channel.title: Recycling on Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society
channel.description: Recent content in Recycling on Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society

item.title: Blorg Bread Baker
item.author: officers@cardiffars.org.uk (Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society)
item.description: The hand-crafted Blorg Bread Baker™ enhances any kitchen. Produced from 100% post-consumer recycled materials you’ll never once think… wait a minute, I’m baking my bread in other people’s refuse.
